name: Spec Ops Tools Drilling Hammer, 3 lbs Sledge hammer with Bi-Material Shock Absorbing & Vibration Dampening Handle, 3% Donated to Veterans, Black/Tan
short_description: 3% donated to veteran and 1st responder causes
RPG (Refined Power Geometry) head for explosive striking power
Integrated composite overstrike armor protects handle from damage (For 2x handle durability)
Bi-material shock-absorbing grip deadens vibration and reduces fatigue for all day use
Compatible with SRS retention lanyards for tethering
product_description: The Spec Ops Tools 3 LBS Drilling Hammer is a demolition powerhouse in a compact, mobile platform. RPG (Refined Power Geometry) head for explosive smashing power. Built for the most punishing work, this sledge is equipped with a shock-absorbing, bi-material grip to dampen vibration and preserve your arm for all-day use. Composite overstrike armor protects the handle from damage due to off-target strikes.  Rubber handle butt cap delivers precision hits while improving handle durability.  Handle is compatible with SRS™ Retention Systems for tethering. All Spec Ops tools are backed by our five-star, limited lifetime warranty and with each purchase made, we support our nation’s heroes by donating 3% of sales to veteran and first responder causes.

name: Spec Ops Tools Engineering Hammer, 4 lb Sledge hammer with Removable Soft Mallet Cap & Bi-Material Shock Absorbing & Vibration Dampening Handle, 3% Donated to Veterans, Black/Tan
short_description: 3% donated to veteran and first responder causes
RPG (Refined Power Geometry) head for explosive striking power
Rounded peen end for metal shaping and concentrated demolition force
Removable non-marring santoprene mallet cap replaces rubber and dead-blow mallets while suppressing strike noise
Integrated composite overstrike armor protects handle from damage (for 2x handle durability)
product_description: The Spec Ops Tools 4 LBS Engineering Hammer is a demolition powerhouse in a compact, mobile platform. RPG (Refined Power Geometry) head for explosive smashing power. Utilizes a rounded peen side for metal shaping and concentrated demolition. This model includes a removable, Santoprene™ mallet cap for non-marring applications. This offers the utility of a rubber or dead-blow mallet without carrying additional tools and suppresses excess jobsite noise when striking metal tools or surfaces. Built for the most punishing work, this sledge is equipped with a shock-absorbing, bi-material grip to dampen vibration and preserve your arm for all-day use. Composite overstrike armor protects the handle from damage due to off-target strikes.  Rubber handle butt cap delivers precision hits while improving handle durability.  Handle is compatible with SRS™ Retention Systems for tethering. All Spec Ops tools are backed by our five-star, limited lifetime warranty and with each purchase made, we support our nation’s heroes by donating 3% of sales to veteran and first responder causes.

name: 4PCS 4LB Sledge Hammer, 14.5 Inch Club Hammer with Forged Steel Head & Fiberglass Handle, Drilling Crack Hammer for Camping, Removing
short_description: HIGH QUALITY - These 4lb sledge hammer are forged from high-carbon steel, capable of withstanding high-intensity impacts. The hammer head is tightly connected to the handle, ensuring long-term use.
DIMENSION INFORMATION - The sledge hammer has a hammer head size of 4.8 x 1.85 inches and a handle length of 12.5 inches, providing a sufficiently long handle for a good user experience.

SHOCK ABSORBING HANDLE - Our 4lb mini sledge hammer features a scientifically designed handle that properly cushions the impact on the hands during use, effectively reducing hand fatigue and improving work efficiency.
WHAT YOU WILL GET - You will receive 4 drilling crack hammer, each weighing 4 pounds, for long-term alternating use.
APPLICATION RANGE - These 4 lb club hammer are suitable for everyday woodworking, furniture assembly, outdoor exploration, striking hard objects ans so on.

name: Wilton B.A.S.H 12" Sledge Hammer, 4 Lb Head (20412)
short_description: Patented hi-vis, drop-forged 46 HRC head endures the most demanding applications
Unbreakable Handle Technology steel core eliminates breaking during overstrikes
Thick, tapered anti-vibe neck absorbs vibration, reducing worker fatigue
Safety plate secures head to handle, preventing head from dislodging
Ergonomic handle is shaped and thickened for improved comfort and less vibration
Vulcanized rubber handle provides a secure no-slip grip while striking
Lanyard hole allows user to safely secure hammer to a wrist or stationary object
product_description: We see a future built on great brands, products, and people. In every facet of our business, we leverage the strengths of our global infrastructure to maximize the benefits of all three.

name: ESTWING Sure Strike Engineer's Hammer - 64 oz Sledge with Fiberglass Handle & No-Slip Cushion Grip - MRF64E
short_description: TOP CHOICE OF GEOLOGISTS WORLDWIDE – The single jack hammer of choice for rockhounds, prospectors & contractors across the globe.
FORGED STEEL HEAD – Estwing's mini sledge is the favorite of pros & DIYers alike. Featuring a fully forged 2 pound head, it is engineered for maximum strength, durability and a lifetime of hard work
VERSATILITY ON THE JOB - Perfect for heavy hammering or demolition work and lets you drive spikes and wedges with ease, this mini sledge delivers.
NON-SLIP FIBERGLASS HANDLE - This mini-sledge features a lightweight yet extremely durable fiberglass handle. The non-slip cushion grip provides added traction and comfort when using this lump hammer
THE FINEST STRIKING TOOLS SINCE 1923- With durability, functionality and longevity at its core, Estwing has been and engineering the world's most trusted striking tools since for nearly 100 years
product_description: The Estwing Engineer's Hammers is an expertly crafted sledge built to deliver powerful strikes with maximum efficiency. It is designed specifically for engineers and construction professionals, making it the ideal choice for your toughest tasks. The hammer features a fiberglass handle that provides exceptional strength and durability. The fiberglass construction ensures long-lasting performance, enabling you to tackle demanding projects without worrying about handling integrity. Whether you're building structures from the ground up or tearing them down, this Engineer's Hammer is the perfect tool for the job. Its superior strength and balanced weight distribution enable precise control and efficient striking, allowing you to tackle any construction or demolition project with confidence. The Estwing Engineer's Hammer is built to deliver precise and accurate blows. Its well-balanced design, combined with a comfortable grip, ensures maximum control and reduces the risk of slippage, enhancing safety and productivity on the job site. Estwing is renowned for manufacturing high-quality tools, and this hammer is no exception. With its solid construction and premium materials, it offers unmatched durability, ensuring it will be a reliable companion for years to come. Invest in Estwing and experience the power and precision you need to excel on your next project.

name: Fiskars Pro IsoCore 4 lb Club Hammer (14") - Drilling Hammer with Wedged Demolition and Driving Face, Shock-Absorbing Grip - Construction and Home Improvement Tools
short_description: Ideal for single-handed use when doing precision demolition work (demolition face) or when driving masonry nails, stakes or chisels (driving face)
Wedged demolition face concentrates force for up to 5x more destructive power than traditional designs and directs debris to the sides, not back at you
Extra-large diameter driving face improves strike accuracy
Patented IsoCore shock control system absorbs strike shock and vibration to reduce the punishment your body takes, transferring 2x less shock and vibration than wood handles
Full lifetime warranty
product_description: This rugged, powerful club hammer allows you to take on intense demolition tasks while helping to reduce muscle fatigue and joint Pain. Premium steel is forged into a unique head featuring a wedged demolition face to maximize destructive force and an extra-large driving face for improved strike accuracy. Fiskars patented, industry-leading IsoCore shock control system absorbs strike shock and vibration, reducing the punishment your body takes and a dual-layer handle captures any lingering vibration. A performance handle design fits your hand securely and comfortably when swinging with maximum force and strategic texturing helps improve grip while reducing blisters. This design has been tested to exceed U.S. Standards for striking tool durability to withstand the toughest work environments. Length: 14" weight: 4 lb.

name: INTERTOOL 4 lbs Small Sledge Hammer | Drilling/Crack Mini Sledgehammer with Heavy-Duty Steel & Shock Absorbing Non-Slip Fiberglass Handle | HT08-0247
short_description: [Forged Steel Head]: Powerful 4 lb hammer, designed for heavy-duty use. Ideal for hard-hitting demolition, construction, and land management
[Durable and Reliable]: With corrosion-resistant construction and overstrike protection, our hammer offers maximum strength and durability for hard work
[Anti-Vibration Handle]: Designed for a comfortable grip and effective shock reduction, reducing fatigue. Non-slip grip for secure handling
[Versatile Tool]: For construction, metalworking, automotive tasks, and beyond. Pairs perfectly with chisels, star drills, punches, and hardened nails
[INTERTOOL has YOU Covered]: We are always available to quickly resolve any issue and answer to your needs. Our community is our #1 priority.

name: Estwing 4-Pound Hard Face Sledge Hammer for Demolition/Stake Driving, 50-55 HRC, 16-Inch Hickory Handle, Ergonomic Grip, Durable Construction
short_description: 16-inch handle - 16-inch long handle provides excellent arc swing for maximum impact
Forged head - 4-pound hammer head is forged from durable alloy steel and is induction hardened to 50-55 hrc
Hickory handle - handle is made from the strongest usa-hickory available in the market
Overstrike protection - reinforcing collar around handle at base of striking head protects against overstrike damage
Ergonomic design - ergonomic handle design helps reduce user fatigue, lower vibration and improve efficiency
product_description: Drive stakes and rebar, shatter stone and concrete, and perform heavy demolition or industrial construction projects with the hard hitting power of this Estwing sledge hammer. Designed and built for heavy-duty use, this hammer features a 4 lb. forged alloy steel head with striking ends hardened to 50-55 HRC to withstand years of repeated impacts without deforming. This head is mounted to a 16-inch long wood handle which is made using premium USA-hickory. To protect against overstrike damage, this hammer has a protective collar around the base of the striking head that helps absorb impacts and prevent damage to the handle. Built to last, this hammer meets not only ANSI tool standards but Estwing's own requirements for superior quality, durability, and performance.

name: Fiskars IsoCore 4 lb Sledge Hammer for Demolition and Driving with Shock Reduction, 14 in
short_description: Powerful wedged demolition face concentrates force for more destructive power than traditional designs, ideal for shattering concrete that directs debris to the sides, not back at you
Extra-large diameter driving face improves strike accuracy for driving stakes and wedges, ideal for demolition work
Patented IsoCore Shock Control System absorbs impact, transferring 2X less shock and vibration than wood handles for reduced user fatigue
Durable design with forged heat-treated steel hammer construction, rust-resistant coating and reinforced metal-end that ensures long-lasting performance, back with a lifetime warranty
Handle flare that keeps the work tool firmly in hand when swinging, with an insulation sleeve to help reduce vibration
product_description: Take on tough demolition and driving tasks with the Fiskars IsoCore 8 lb. Sledge Hammer. This powerful sledge hammer features a wedged demolition face that concentrates force for up to 5 times more destructive power than traditional designs, making it ideal for shattering concrete. The Fiskars sledge hammer also features an extra-large diameter driving face to improve strike accuracy when driving stakes and wedges. This sledge hammer is built with durability in mind. The head is constructed from forged steel and features a reinforced metal end to withstand repeated blows and strikes. Demolition work can be tough on your body. The Fiskars IsoCore Sledge Hammer features a patented IsoCore Shock Control System that absorbs strike shock and vibration, transferring 2X less shock and vibration than traditional wood handles. This helps to reduce user fatigue and keep you working comfortably for longer. This Fiskars IsoCore Sledge Hammer is backed by a limited lifetime warranty, a testament to the quality and durability of this tool.

name: 2 Pack 4lb Small Sledge Hammer, Club Hammer with Fibreglass Shaft, Lump Hammer for Gardening, Camping, Rock
short_description: DIMENSIONS - The overall length of the sledge hammer is 300mm, of which the length of the rubberised handle is 145mm, the width of the hammer head is 115mm and the diameter of the striking face of the hammer head is 45mm.You will receive 2PCS of the sledge hammer.

MATERIALS - The small sledge hammer is made from high carbon steel with a rubberised handle for durability. It is forged in whole without welding, which makes it less prone to breakage and allows it to withstand long periods of use.

HANDLE DESIGN - The club hammer's rubberised handle ensures good non-slip and impact resistance, reducing the transmission of vibrations, it is not easy to get out of your hand, and you will be more relaxed when using it.

PRACTICAL TOOLS - The lump hammer is the ideal tool for piling, rock or concrete removal, it can be used in a variety of scenarios such as maintenance, renovation, camping, geological exploration and so on.

WORRY FREE PURCHASE - If you have any dissatisfaction or feedback with sledge hammer after receiving the product, you can contact us. We are dedicated to providing you a satisfactory shopping satisfaction.
